text: Gustaf 'Valter' Eugen Kolmodin (1910-1952), was a male Swedish international table tennis player. He won a bronze medal at the 1930 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's doubles with Hille Nilsson and a silver medal in the men's team event. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Swedish male table tennis players Category:1910 births Category:1952 deaths Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Valter Kolmodin
